Title: Penny Serenade
Cast: Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Beulah Bondi, Edgar Buchanan, Ann Doran, Eva Lee Kuney, Leonard Willey, Wallis Clark, Walter Soderling, Jane Biffle
Plot: A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy. As Julie prepares to leave her husband Roger, she begins to play through a stack of recordings, each of which reminds her of events in their lives together. One of them is the song that was playing when she and Roger first met in a music store. Other songs remind her of their courtship, their marriage, their desire for a child, and the joys and sorrows that they have shared. A flood of memories comes back to her as she ponders their present problems and how they arose. Written by Snow Leopard
Keywords: music store, recording, marriage, motherhood, death of unborn child
Actors: Cary Grant, Irene Dunne, Beulah Bondi
Description: Directed by George Stevens.  With Cary Grant, Irene Dunne, Beulah Bondi, Edgar Buchanan. A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy.
